scripts.usemin: usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin beatrix-potter.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/beatrix-potter.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin catalogPage.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/catalogPage.html && usemin happy-books.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/happy-books.html && usemin puppy-love.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/puppy-love.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin && npm run scss-build && npm run copyjs
